channel.title: latex2rtf on sergem's personal public notebook

item.title: Fixed "latex2png: error: eps2eps failed to translate .pdf to .eps" message in latex2rtf
item.description: OMG!! I finally fixed it. Under Windows latex2rtf diisplayed following error: latex2png: error: eps2eps failed to translate l2r_00123.pdf to l2r_00123.eps for each image in my latex file. That was very sad because this method is used to convert all equations, fugures and tables in word format. The configurations seemed ok: The problem was in eps2eps script in miktex. This script is magical. I haven’t completely understood why it does nothing when called from latex2rtf.
